name: Quest Coat
description: QuestCoat is a digitised version of IRL QuestCoat created as a part of the award-winning fashion tech collection Vision Quest ( Grand Prix IOT/WT Innovation World Cup). The leading theme of the Vision Quest collection is enlightenment. Light technology  created with over 50 meters of the electroluminescent wire symbolises spiritual awaking, intellectual growth, evolution and progress. Silhouette is influenced by medieval Asian ceremonial-wear and Far East occasion-wear. Embroidery informed by the shapes of the modern architecture, was created with over 10 000 glass tubes.
